data.title: Good spot if you're hungry
data.text: It was early morning and I just didn't want your typical McDonalds breakfast. So I found this spot and decided to give it a try. I like how they cook (really cook not warm up or microwave) your food for you. And you can get a really decent breakfast for not a lot of money.

data.title: GOOD SOLID BREAKFAST
data.text:
The Golden Ox is well known for its breakfasts.  The offerings include everything from simple to great steak and eggs.  The food is well prepared and flavorful.

They have a fairly large crowd every morning.  You order at the counter and the server brings your food.
